definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
(bird species of China) purple sunbird (Cinnyris asiaticus)
(bird species of China) purple-naped sunbird (Hypogramma hypogrammicum)
(bird species of China) olive-backed sunbird (Cinnyris jugularis)

sentences.english: The bee sucks honey out of the bitterest flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂是從最苦的花朵中吸取花蜜。

sentences.english: Because in its scramble to reach the nectar, a whole bundle of pollen-packets sticks to the wasp between its feelers.
sentences.chinese: 因爲黃蜂尋找花蜜時，觸角之間會粘上一小包花粉。

sentences.english: Agave nectar is one alternative that is used by health conscious consumers.
sentences.chinese: 龍舌蘭花蜜是具有保健意識的消費者的選擇之一。

sentences.english: Black nectar cannot be used for scrying or as a power component.
sentences.chinese: 黑色的花蜜無法用來探知也無法作爲法術材料。

sentences.english: Hummingbirds have stiletto - like bills to probe the deepest nectar - bearing flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鳥有鑽孔錐一樣的喙來探進有花蜜花朵的最深處。

sentences.english: The liquid gives them food and material to make honey.
sentences.chinese: 花蜜爲蜜蜂提供食物和釀蜜的原料。

sentences.english: The flower buds of the palm collect yeast, which ferments the nectar, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他們表示，棕櫚樹的花蕾聚集了使花蜜發酵的酵母。

sentences.english: Hummingbirds have stiletto-like bills to probe the deepest nectar-bearing flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鳥有鑽孔錐一樣的喙來探進有花蜜花朵的最深處。

sentences.english: It is the job of the most mature worker bees to leave the hive to collect nectar from flowers.
sentences.chinese: 大多數成熟工蜂的職責就是離巢採集花蜜。

sentences.english: The nectar of the helleborine is fermented-it does contain alcohol!
sentences.chinese: 這種蘭花的花蜜發酵過，確實含有酒精。

sentences.english: Good weather in early spring allowed them to forage for nectar.
sentences.chinese: 在早春溫暖氣候下，它們就可以採集花蜜了。

sentences.english: CELL】Bees store honey in the cells of a honeycomb.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂將花蜜儲存在蜂巢的各個小蜂窩中。

sentences.english: I usually eat only insects but also might eat fruit and flower nectar.
sentences.chinese: 我通常只吃昆蟲，但也喫水果和花蜜。

sentences.english: The scent of nectar drew them from a colony miles away.
sentences.chinese: 花蜜的香味將他們從幾英里外的棲息地吸引了過來。
